details.claim_text: Federal officials have found no evidence linking Charlie Kirk's shooting to left-wing groups.
details.claim_context: The post cites NBC News, reporting that the federal investigation into the shooting of Charlie Kirk has not found any connection between the alleged shooter, Tyler Robinson, and left-wing groups. Sources familiar with the probe indicate the shooting appears to be the act of an individual offended by Kirk's ideology. It may also be difficult to file federal charges against Robinson.
